name: Large rainbow covered gloves
data: It increases the users wisdom pathetically.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It decreases the users charisma ILLEGALLY.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration unnoticably.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'prismatic spray'.
